info.label: Front-end Developer
info.brief: Web developer from Paris with 8+ years of experience, a good eye for design and good communication skills, looking for new opportunities in Berlin. Problem‑solver seeking new challenges and to get things done, interested in working with component‑based frameworks, API-oriented products and JAM stack apps.

highlights: Handled 25+ client projects for CAC40 and SBF120 companies such as banks, energy companies, and asset managers; by developing a theming system for newsrooms and emailing on top of Symfony/MongoDB.
Hired and supervised a team of 2 to 6 people including developers, designers and a project manager and set up a design-development workflow using Atomic Design principles.

Developed themes and plugins for Osclass CMS sold on a marketplace, cumulating 15 000+ downloads mainly in the USA, India, Brazil and Europe; such as: messaging, SEO, emailing customization, users management, Mailchimp integration, Single sign-on, etc.
Launched a french flatsharing and roommate finder website, reaching 16 000 users and 70 000+ page views per month.

Designed the website and brand identity. Developed the website’s front-end and back-end features such as: a search with advanced Google Map integration, one-to-one and group messaging and a booking/payment system (Stripe / MangoPay).
Managed and developed over 200 monitoring probe scripts executing across 100+ heterogeneous information systems of top French finance, bank, energy or tourism companies

Developed a probe framework/SDK in Perl to unify inputs and outputs, hunted duplicates and set up versioning, dependency management, packaging and normalized execution environments (deployment of physical appliance).

history.title: Master II MIAGE
history.summary: Management applied to computer science, specialization in Change Management

interests.name: Music
interests.summary: Guitar and Bass Guitar player (10+ years’ experience). Concerts, discovering new music and creating eclectic playlists.
